summary: A man buys a house and comes to believe that not only is the house haunted by werewolves, but a family of vampires lives next door.
cast: Dan Rowan|Dick Martin|Carol Lynley|Julie Newmar|Mildred Natwick|Fritz Weaver|Robert Reed|David Hurst|Dana Elcar|Leon Askin|Alan Oppenheimer|Eddra Gale|Arthur Batanides|Pamela Rodgers|Jennifer Bishop|Maudie Prickett|Garry Walberg|Carol-Jean Thompson|Jerry Mann|Mike Kellin
title: Qué muertos más divertidos
